events.message: We have received the application from Jane Doe for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience in cloud technologies.
Jane's application has been categorized under engineering roles, specifically as a software developer focused on backend systems.
Assigned recruiter Michael Smith to handle Jane's application and coordinate the next steps for the technical screening process.
Conducted an initial screening with Jane; she demonstrated strong knowledge in software development practices and cloud infrastructure.
Jane responded promptly and enthusiastically to the interview invitation, expressing eagerness to proceed with the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for Jane with the engineering lead on May 7th at 10 AM UTC to further assess her coding skills and system design abilities.
